summoned with #790 Revive Bane Lord (Conjuration 5)

The Bane Lord is an ancient hero serving as a general of the Underworld. The hero has now been reawakened to serve a necromancer. The Bane Lord is armed with a horrible Bane Blade. Bane Lords are so closely connected with the Netherworld that they are surrounded by a wind of numbing cold. Bane Lords are corporeal undead with leathery bodies that can withstand much damage.
